107.movie_plot: A playboy becomes interested in the daughter of his family's chauffeur, but it's his more serious brother who would be the better man for her.

69.movie_plot: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

147.movie_plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield to kill again.

4.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

58.movie_plot: In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.

29.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

162.movie_plot: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.

112.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

139.movie_plot: A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.

135.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

87.movie_plot: Wallace takes a break from trying to decide on a holiday destination only to find he has no cheese for his crackers. The solution to both problems is a trip to the moon, with dog Gromit, because everybody knows the moon's made of cheese.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

164.movie_plot: One of the sons of Frankenstein finds his father's monster in a coma and revives him, only to find out he is controlled by Ygor who is bent on revenge.

64.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

120.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

167.movie_plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.

104.movie_plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

24.movie_plot: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

148.movie_plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.

113.movie_plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.

131.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

52.movie_plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

98.movie_plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.

189.movie_plot: A self-conscious bride is tormented by the memory of her husband's dead first wife.

25.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

156.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

184.movie_plot: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

19.movie_plot: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

93.movie_plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.

51.movie_plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.

3.movie_name: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937)
3.movie_plot: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

127.movie_plot: A college professor invents an anti-gravity substance which a corrupt businessman wants for himself.

95.movie_plot: An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that he is not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.

21.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
21.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

180.movie_plot: The lives of two struggling musicians, who happen to be brothers, inevitably change when they team up with a beautiful, up-and-coming singer.

134.movie_plot: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.

108.movie_plot: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

124.movie_plot: An aspiring author during the civil rights movement of the 1960s decides to write a book detailing the African American maids' point of view on the white families for which they work, and the hardships they go through on a daily basis.

146.movie_name: Children of Paradise (Les enfants du paradis) (1945)
146.movie_plot: The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.

54.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

101.movie_plot: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

159.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

32.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

182.movie_plot: Film critics, actors, film historians and other personalities share their experiences and curious stories on the acclaimed Billy Wilder's masterpiece "Sunset Blvd."; its cultural importance...

89.movie_plot: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

71.movie_plot: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

116.movie_plot: When a princess is shrunken by an evil wizard, Sinbad must undertake a quest to an island of monsters to cure her and prevent a war.

188.movie_plot: Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.

166.movie_plot: A young couple moves in to an apartment only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins to control her life.
